divs: sighting detailson sun. june 22, 08 while at the beach in port aransas tx. i was setting in my car - as my 2 teens were playing in the sand. i was reading, and looked up > at one of the frequent times of glancing at the children, and saw coming from right to left - in a straight line down the coastline - going right over the childrens head"s, a flying object - it moved slowly, and in a direct straight line - it made no noise. it was not a kite - or a remote controlled airplane, or craft\glider. this was something quite different. this object looked exactly like the flying nuns hat off the old t.v. show "the flying nun - from the 60's. type in the search bar...flying nun, and there you will see the shape of this object, (her hat). it was as an airplane like - but smaller, and as i watched it glyde past my childrens head and hover down the coastline, i honked to get the childrens attention, but they were some distance away, and with the waves crashing - they were unable to hear me, i got out of the car, and very rapidly began walking torward them, the object sped up, then... - it quickly vanished. all this happened within a minute or 2 at the most. this is a true story - no added details - or descriptions. i did not notice anyone looking up at this, as there were not many there, it was around 6:30 pm. i am very interested to find out what this may have been.
Summary: THIS LOOKED EXACTLY LIKE THE FLYING NUNS HAT - THE TV SHOW FROM THE 60'S
